Subject: Request for Your Personal Information
Dear [Name],
We're writing to inform you that we have received some suspicious activity on your account. We would like to request for all your personal details such as your name, address, and phone number. Please provide us with this information to confirm your identity or enable us to make payments for you. Any information provided will be kept confidential and we won't share it with any third party. Can you please provide us with your name, address, and phone number so we can confirm your identity or enable payments for you? If you have provided this information in the past, please let us know so we can update your records. Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. We appreciate your trust and we will take all necessary steps to ensure your privacy is protected at all times. If you are interested in receiving further communication from us, please let us know by contacting us at this email address: [
